summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account for the month of March 2019. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant transactions including a large outgoing transfer.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial statement from Deutsche Bank, detailing his account balances and transactions.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Account Statement Period Start
events.description: The account statement period begins, showing the starting balance and transactions for March 2019.

events.title: Account Statement Period End
events.description: The account statement period ends, detailing the ending balance and significant transactions for March 2019.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A cash transfer of $2,000,000.00 is recorded as a credit to the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $2,501,700.00 to Bank of America is recorded.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance at Deutsche Bank as of March 31, 2019.
The beginning balance on March 1, 2019, was $7,493,479.94.
A significant outgoing transfer of $2,501,700.00 to Bank of America occurred on March 29, 2019.
A cash transfer of $2,000,000.00 was credited to the account on March 26, 2019.
Stewart Oldfield is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
